snippet: As if visiting the Paris Catacombs in the daytime wasn't creepy enough — you can now visit the underground maze of skeletons after nightfall, too. That is if you dare defy the warning at the entrance: "Stop, this is the empire of Death."...

headline.print_headline: Paris Catacombs Open at Night Ahead of Halloween
headline.main: Paris Catacombs Open at Night Ahead of Halloween

lead_paragraph: As if visiting the Paris Catacombs in the daytime wasn't creepy enough — you can now visit the underground maze of skeletons after nightfall, too. That is if you dare defy the warning at the entrance: "Stop, this is the empire of Death."
